traceability.evidence:
Multiple dedicated tests for auto-update are present and passing, including: - test/printOutdated.update.test.js – verifies --update --yes applies safe updates, creates backup, writes package.json preserving values, and logs summary and install prompt. - test/printOutdated.updatePromptAbort.test.js – verifies abort on user ‘no’, no backup or changes. - test/printOutdated.updateBackupError.test.js – simulates backup failure and checks graceful error handling without modifying package.json.
Implementation in src/print-outdated.js and src/update-packages.js supports all acceptance criteria: `--update` flag, safe-only updates, preview and confirmation prompt, `--yes` skip, backup creation, formatting-preserving write, summary report, install reminder, and error handling.
traceability.notes: All acceptance criteria for story 011.0-DEV-AUTO-UPDATE are fully implemented and covered by tests. The CLI help and option parsing include --update and --yes, and the code paths flow correctly through preview, confirmation, backup, update, and summary steps.
